title: Trump's Birtherism/Listener Mail
description: An EARLY EDITION of Monday Mail...topped with a quick discussion of Donald Trump and birtherism. This episode, host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
